sentences.en: A brief, handwritten postscript lay beneath his signature.
sentences.cn: 一段简短的手写体附言位于他的签名下方。

sentences.en: The letter was handwritten, in a hasty, barely decipherable scrawl.
sentences.cn: 这封信是手写的，字迹潦草，几乎无法辨认。

sentences.en: The machine can recognize handwritten characters and turn them into printed text.
sentences.cn: 这台机器能识别手写的文字并将其转换为打印文本。
